name: Death From Above (itch) (Micro Bros)
description:
Death From Above is my first ever (completed) game in unity!

It was originally created for my dad to test my programming skills but soon after it became a big project! Its still a little rough around the edges so I'm open to any suggestions.

CONTROLS:

Use W,A,D to move and jump around

Use the space bar or left click to shoot

Thanks for playing and have fun!!
